sentence.Network_en: The main cause of women's and children's oppression is patriarchy.
sentence.Network_cn: 妇女儿童受压迫的主要原因是父权制。

sentence.Network_en: That's not very different from what patriarchy always says about women.
sentence.Network_cn: 这跟父权文化对女人的一贯看法并没有很大差别.

sentence.Network_en: The patriarchy - centered culture emerged and grew in the semi - feudal and semi - colonial soil.
sentence.Network_cn: 半封建 半殖民地 的社会土壤,滋生并繁衍了男权中心文化.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: via medieval Latin from Greek patriarkhia, from patriarkhēs 'ruling father' (see patriarch)

entry.def: Patriarchy is a system in which men have all or most of the power and importance in a society or group.

example.ex: The main cause of women's and children's oppression is patriarchy.
example.tran: 妇女儿童受压迫的主要原因是父权制。

entry.def: A patriarchy is a patriarchal society.

means.word_mean: 1. a form of social organization in which a male is the family head and title is traced through the male line

stems_affixes.value_cn: 家长的;族长的;家长似的
stems_affixes.word_buile: patriarch家长+al……的→adj.家长的;族长的;家长似的
patri父,祖+arch统治者,首脑,长→n.家长;族长
patri父亲+archy统治者→n.家长,父系社会
patri父亲+mony状态或物→父亲留下的物品→遗产
patri祖国[比喻成父亲]+ot人→n.爱国者,爱国主义者
patriot爱国+ism主义→n.爱国主义;爱国心
ex出+patri祖国+ate表动词→出祖国→驱逐出国
re重新+patri祖国+ate表动词→重新回到祖国
